properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
SCOTLAND.
DNC 19.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ IN
57-15.0N 009-47.3W AT 041330Z FEB.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
PHONE: 4434 4382 0028, 44 344 382 0025,
FAX: 4413 2924 4547,
E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
